title: Samsung Keyboardâ€™s new update might reduce your typos
content:
Samsung Keyboard has been the default keyboard on Galaxy smartphones and tablets for years, but for most of that time, it hasn’t been all that great compared to Gboard and other alternatives. The keyboard has been slowly improving, though, and now Samsung is rolling out another update that might reduce your typos. Samsung Keyboard version

The post Samsung Keyboard’s new update might reduce your typos appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung Keyboard is rolling out more typo and grammar correction improvements, as well as a laundry list of bug fixes.
